title: Make sure that the live logger is global ready
body:
- [x] Ensure all new strings used in the logger are localizeable
  - #8682
- [x] Ensure all unicode user content like file paths/names shows up correctly in the live logger
  - manually tested, for example  
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25249058/233353865-67928217-96a4-458e-93fc-51f474116179.png)
- [x] Ensure any time formats (or other formats) that show up in the live logger are culture specific
